content: Sure! Tran lost the argument because they made a mistake in their reasoning. They said that only women can understand what women are, and that men shouldn't have an opinion. Matt used an example with cats to show that this doesn't make sense - just because you're not a member of a group doesn't mean you can't understand or have an opinion about it. Instead of addressing Matt's point, Tran responded with sarcasm and didn't explain their reasoning clearly, which made their argument weaker.
